'''Jill''' is an [[NPC]] in [[Mondstadt]]. She can be found with [[Will]] at [[Falcon Coast]] during daytime (06:00 – 19:00).

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player four [[Crab]]s.

NPC Location Jill, Mack & Will.png|Jill's location ''(Daytime)''

==Profile==
<!--detailed story/lore information goes here-->
Jill, together with Will, want to play with [[Dr. Edith]] at Windrise but they ended up at the Falcon coast while trying to get away from [[Mack]] who they find suspicious. However, Mack is a Knight of Favonius who is keeping watch over them wherever they go.

===Personality===
Jill is very playful and like catching crabs over collecting shells.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Jill:''' Hi...? Is something wrong?
:{{DIcon}} Found any nice shells on the beach?
::'''Jill:''' Er... Sorry, I don't really like shells.
::{{DIcon|Reward}} So what do you like?
:::'''Jill:''' Crabs, obviously. Don't you think it's cute, how they walk sideways?
:::'''Jill:''' And they're even harder to catch than fish! Hey, since you're so interested, you might as well take 'em. Here.
:::'''Jill:''' I can always catch more, it's no big deal.
::;(Obtain [[Crab]] ×4).
:{{DIcon}} What are you hanging out here for?
::'''Jill:''' Can you see Mr. Guard over there?
::'''Jill:''' Me and Will wanna go and play with Ms. Edith at Windrise...
::'''Jill:''' But Mr. Guard keeps following us and we can't get rid of him. I'm a bit scared, he looks like a bad guy.
::'''Jill:''' That's why we ended up here, because we're trying to run away from him.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Jill:''' Bye-bye!
{{Dialogue end}}
